1315470.name: Battlefield 4™ Assault Shortcut Kit
1315470.description:
The Assault Shortcut Kit gives you the boost you need to make a difference on the battlefield with instant access to Assault progression upgrades, specializations, and weapons. Whether you’re new to Battlefield 4 or just want to make up for lost time, Shortcut Kits help you go toe-to-toe with Battlefield veterans by instantly unlocking powerful gear or bonuses that would otherwise be obtained through play.

10 gadgets and weapon accessories. Bring your friends back to life with the Defibrillator, refill their health with the Medic Bag, and unleash destruction with a variety of grenades and under-barrel weapon attachments.

3 class specializations. There's no such thing as a one-size-fits-all approach to battle. Become a front line powerhouse with the Offensive Spec, keep your team healthy using the Combat Medic Spec, or take on the Grenadier Spec and go nuts with explosives.

8 assault rifles. With a full arsenal of assault rifles, you'll always have the perfect tool for the job at hand.

Note: this Shortcut Kit does not include any gadgets or weapons added by expansion packs.
1315470.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语, 日语*, 韩语, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
